Body:
"""Tests optimization as a single call."""
best, vals, exp, model = optimize(parameters=[{'name': 'x1', 'type':
    'range', 'bounds': [-10.0, 10.0]}, {'name': 'x2', 'type': 'range',
    'bounds': [-10.0, 10.0]}], evaluation_function=lambda p: (p['x1'] + 2 *
    p['x2'] - 7) ** 2 + (2 * p['x1'] + p['x2'] - 5) ** 2, minimize=True,
    total_trials=5)
self.assertIn('x1', best)
self.assertIn('x2', best)
assert vals is not None
self.assertIn('objective', vals[0])
self.assertIn('objective', vals[1])
self.assertIn('objective', vals[1]['objective'])
